snippet.title: Angel’s Lullaby UNDETALE fangame trailer (for UNDEREVENT)
snippet.description:
TRAILER made for UNDEREVENT:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aOadit6diGE
Special thanks to Rusty, Snowy and Kasssm for the event!



Back before the events of Undertale, the legends of old were once new.

Monster and Humans lived among each other in peace, all was well. That is, until the Seven Wise read the stars to hear of a great calamity.

A human child is found dead, they say a monster was responsible.

War is imminent, victory is inevitable.

Alas, all of this can be undone, if the Hopes and Dreams of One can change Fate.

And perhaps, the legends may not be as set in stone as one might have thought...

Tonight, they call to you.

This is their Angel's Lullaby,

A song sung just for You.
x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x-x
gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/Angels-Lullaby/352676


itch.io: https://starlightshore.itch.io/angels​...

Game made by starlightshore

Music composed by https://potato-arts.tumblr.com/​
, opening theme mixed by Augie Bello ( @augie_bello on instagram)

lets-plays are allowed, but please keep opening credits up and keep the video demonetized. thank you. oh also, please link me so I can see it, that sounds wonderful.

Made in GameMaker Studio 2.3, Photoshop CC 2018, Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2018, aesprite and Clip Paint Studio EX

Made in the UNDERTALE Engine by TML, which is owned by Jevilhumor
Additonal help for coding by Jevilhumor and Smashcreeper
